job.name: updateListingStatusJob
job.description: Updates the status for a set of listings

entry.value: [{"label": "Listings [Comma Delimited]", "key": "listings", "type": "textarea"}, {"label": "ListingStatus", "key": "certificationStatus", "type": "select", "items": [{"id": 1, "name": "Active"}, {"id": 2, "name": "Retired"}, {"id": 3, "name": "Withdrawn by Developer"}, {"id": 4, "name": "Withdrawn by ONC-ACB"}, {"id": 5, "name": "Pending"}, {"id": 6, "name": "Suspended by OCD-ACB"}, {"id": 7, "name": "Suspended by ONC"}, {"id": 8, "name": "Terminated by ONC"}, {"id": 9, "name": "Withdrawn by Developer Under Surveillance/Review"}] }, {"label": "Effective Date", "key": "effectiveDate", "type": "date"}]
